name: Dice Floor
description:
This version's (the old build) UI is nonexistent and really buggy, but nothing could be done. It should be somewhat playable though. If you happen to open the pause manu you just might notice the lack of any indications of what the UI elements mean. In the pause menu the left button is "restart" and right button is "continue". The slider is for volume.

Credits

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 by PikseliMikke and Sampza12.
